text: 19.72 To support increased cycle use and particularly cycling to work, new office developments should include complementary cycling amenities where appropriate, such as accessible showers, changing rooms, and storage lockers. 19.73 This policy should be read in conjunction with Policy MC5 and London Plan Policy T6 to ensure that along with on-site parking provision, development provides adequate delivery and servicing facilities within the site as well as encouraging shared servicing arrangements and timing of deliveries.
